https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2U0ib61DnAQuooxyiS0eP59nIZD.jpg Surya falls in love with a girl and follows her to Kolkata, where she stays with her rowdy elder brother. Later, he decides to rescue her when he discovers that a gangster wants to marry her forcibly. Awara
